Networks are generally used for determining what members see in the "what's new" feed, letting consumers associate with each other based on common profile information (without needing to be friends directly), and serving advertisements to specific groups of members. Each member can join one or more networks if you allow them to, and their networks will be shown on their profile. If you decide to have networks, be sure that they relate to your community's theme. For example, if your community has members from various countries, you can create a network for each country. If you want your members to see recent posts from other people in their networks (even if they're not yet friends with each other), you can adjust that setting %s.

One of your member levels must be marked as the "default level". When new members sign up, they will automatically belong to this level. Facilitating relationships between consumers is essential to building a successful social network. There are several different types of connections that can exist between consumers. Use this page to determine how consumers will associate with each other. Note that although we refer to these relationships as "friendships" in this control panel, you should use a word that best fits with your social network's theme. For example, if you are running a business-oriented social network, you may want to change this word to "connections".
Who can consumers invite to become their friends? Note that if you select "nobody", none of the other settings on this page will apply.
Only consumers in their networks

Your social network can allow either one-way or two-way friendships. The default setting is two-way friendships as this is typical for most social networks. One-way friendships mean that when ConsumerA adds ConsumerB, Consumer will appear on ConsumerA's friend list but NOT the reverse.

Your social network can allow either verified or unverified friendship requests. The default setting is verified friendship requests as this is typical for most social networks. Unverified friendship requests mean that when MemberA adds MemberB as a friend, ConsumerA and ConsumerB will immediately become friends without any confirmation.

Using friend lists, your members can organize their friends under various labels that they create. They can then use these lists to send messages to multiple friends and customize their privacy settings.

Specify what privacy options will be available to members in this level.
Specify what privacy options will be available to members in this level.
If set to "yes", members can block other members from sending them private messages, requesting their friendship, and viewing their profile. This helps fight spam and network abuse.

If set to "yes", members will be able to exclude themselves from search results and the lists of members on the homepage (such as Recent Signups). Otherwise, all members will be included in search results.

Your members can choose from any of the options checked below when they decide who can see their profile. If you do not check any options, settings will default to the last saved configuration. If you select only one option, members of this level will not have a choice.

Your members can choose from any of the options checked below when they decide who can post comments on their profile. If you do not check any options, settings will default to the last saved configuration. If you select only one option, members of this level will not have a choice.
If set to "yes", members can post their "status" on their profile. By updating their status, members can tell others what they are up to, what's on their minds, etc.
If set to "yes", members will have the option of changing their username. If usernames are not enabled, this setting has no effect.
Do you want to allow members to message each other?

If set to "yes", members will have the option of deleting their accounts.
If set to "yes", members will have the option of deleting their accounts.
If you have selected YES, members will be given the option of choosing a unique profile address. If you select NO, their user id will be used in the URL instead.

Yes, allow members to choose a profile address.
Yes, allow members to choose a profile address.

Your consumers will be asked to provide some information about themselves when joining the community or editing their profile. This is the value of 'items' key in the manifest file of this plugin. To view this value for a desired module, go to the directory of this module, and open the file 'settings/manifest.php'. In this file, search for 'items', and view its value. [Ex in case of blog module: Open file 'application/modules/Blog/settings/manifest.php', and go to around line 62. You will see the 'items' key array with value 'blog'. Thus, the Database Table Item for blog module is: 'blog']

Privacy
Wolmal.com respect your privacy and is committed to maintaining the confidentiality of the personal information/data provided by our users. By submitting personal information / data to us and/or by using our website you give your consent that all personal information/data that you may submit may be processed by us in the manner and for the purposes described below.
WHAT IS PERSONAL INFORMATION/ DATA?
1. The term ‘personal information/ data’ refers to personally identifiable information about you such as your name, date of birth, address or email address. Please note that by submitting your personal information / data manually or in electronic form to us and/or by using our website, you give your consent that all personal information/ data submitted on each occasion may be petitioner processed by, and/or shared with wolmal.com and its affiliates and related companies, in the manner and for the purposes described in this policy.
HOW WE COLLECT PERSONAL INFORMATION/ DATA
1. We collect information about you when you register with us on our website. We will also collect information when you voluntarily complete surveys or provide feedback. Website usage information is collected using cookies, and through automatic means.
2. If you decide to purchase any goods or services that we offer, we will need to collect financial information in order to complete the transaction
HOW WE USE PERSONAL INFORMATION/ DATA?
1. We collect information about you to provide the services available and, if you agree, to send you information about us and promotional materials about other companies associated with us.
2. We may use information collected about you from the website to personalize your repeat visits to our website.
3. We may pass on your non – personally identifiable demographic information in connection with our advertisers and other service partners.
YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION/ DATA & THIRD PARTIES
1. We may disclose your personal information/ data to third parties if we buy or sell any business assets, in which case we may disclose your personal information/data to a prospective buyer or seller of such assets. If our company is bought by another company, the personal information/ data we hold about you and our other registered users and customers will be one of the assets transferred when the company is sold.
2. We may also disclose your personal information/data if we are required by law to do so.
MARKETING
1. We would like to send you information about products and services of our and other associated companies which may be of interest to you. If you have consented to receive marketing information, you may opt out of it at a later date.
2. You have a right at any time to stop us or any associated companies from contacting you for marketing purposes.
3. If you no longer wish to be contacted for marketing purposes please contact us at the address given at the end of this document.
ACCESS TO YOUR INFORMATION AND CORRECTION
1. You have the right to request a copy of the information that we hold about you. If you would like a copy of some or all of your personal information, please email or write to us at the address given at the end of this document. We may make a small charge for this service.
2. We want to make sure that your personal information/ data is accurate and up to date. You may ask us to correct or remove information that you think is in accurate.
ANONYMOUS DATA COLLECTED THROUGH WOLMAL
1. We automatically collect some information when you visit the site because your IP address needs to be recognized by our server. We do not identify users or collect cookies from this information.
COOKIES
1. We make use of ‘cookies’ to track your use of our website. Cookies are text files places on your computer to collect standard internet log information and visitor behavior information. This information is used to track visitor use of the website and to compile statistical reports activity.
2. You can set your browser not to accept cookies. However, in some cases, some of our website’s features may not function as a result.
OTHER WEBSITES
1. WOLMAL contains links to other websites. This Privacy Policy only applies to this website so when you link to other websites, you should read their own privacy policies.
2. Information posted on chat rooms, forums, message boards and/or groups that we may host on this website becomes public information and you should exercise caution when deciding to disclose your personal data/information.
COPYRIGHT POLICY
1. As a WOLMAL account holder, you may submit content to wolmal.com, including videos and user comments.wolmal.com does not guarantee any confidentiality with respect to any content you submit.
2. The user shall be solely responsible for the content and the consequences of submitting and publishing his/ her content.
3. Wolmal will terminate a user’s account if, under appropriate circumstances, the user is determined to be a repeated infringer. A repeated infringer is one who has been notified of infringing activity more than twice.
CHANGES TO OUR PRIVACY POLICY 
1. We will improve and add new functionality and features to this website and improve and add to our existing products, services and promotions. Because of these ongoing changes, changes in the law and the changing nature of technology, our data practices will change from time to time. If and when our data practices change, we will post the changes on our website to notify you. We encourage you to check this page frequently.
If you have any queries or questions about our privacy policy or the information we hold about you, if you wish to opt out of marketing materials, to make a request for information or request the correction/ deletion of information you can contact us at the below email address.
 Email: mail@wolmal.com

Wolmal.com respect your privacy and is committed to maintaining the confidentiality of the personal information/data provided by our users. By submitting personal information / data to us and/or by using our website you give your consent that all personal information/data that you may submit may be processed by us in the manner and for the purposes described below.

WHAT IS PERSONAL INFORMATION/ DATA?
1. The term ‘personal information/ data’ refers to personally identifiable information about you such as your name, date of birth, address or email address. Please note that by submitting your personal information / data manually or in electronic form to us and/or by using our website, you give your consent that all personal information/ data submitted on each occasion may be petitioner processed by, and/or shared with wolmal.com and its affiliates and related companies, in the manner and for the purposes described in this policy.

HOW WE COLLECT PERSONAL INFORMATION/ DATA
1. We collect information about you when you register with us on our website. We will also collect information when you voluntarily complete surveys or provide feedback. Website usage information is collected using cookies, and through automatic means.
2. If you decide to purchase any goods or services that we offer, we will need to collect financial information in order to complete the transaction

HOW WE USE PERSONAL INFORMATION/ DATA?
1. We collect information about you to provide the services available and, if you agree, to send you information about us and promotional materials about other companies associated with us.
2. We may use information collected about you from the website to personalize your repeat visits to our website.
3. We may pass on your non – personally identifiable demographic information in connection with our advertisers and other service partners.

YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION/ DATA & THIRD PARTIES
1. We may disclose your personal information/ data to third parties if we buy or sell any business assets, in which case we may disclose your personal information/data to a prospective buyer or seller of such assets. If our company is bought by another company, the personal information/ data we hold about you and our other registered users and customers will be one of the assets transferred when the company is sold.
2. We may also disclose your personal information/data if we are required by law to do so.

MARKETING
1. We would like to send you information about products and services of our and other associated companies which may be of interest to you. If you have consented to receive marketing information, you may opt out of it at a later date.
2. You have a right at any time to stop us or any associated companies from contacting you for marketing purposes.
3. If you no longer wish to be contacted for marketing purposes please contact us at the address given at the end of this document.

ACCESS TO YOUR INFORMATION AND CORRECTION
1. You have the right to request a copy of the information that we hold about you. If you would like a copy of some or all of your personal information, please email or write to us at the address given at the end of this document. We may make a small charge for this service.
2. We want to make sure that your personal information/ data is accurate and up to date. You may ask us to correct or remove information that you think is in accurate.

ANONYMOUS DATA COLLECTED THROUGH WOLMAL
1. We automatically collect some information when you visit the site because your IP address needs to be recognized by our server. We do not identify users or collect cookies from this information.

COOKIES
1. We make use of ‘cookies’ to track your use of our website. Cookies are text files places on your computer to collect standard internet log information and visitor behavior information. This information is used to track visitor use of the website and to compile statistical reports activity.
2. You can set your browser not to accept cookies. However, in some cases, some of our website’s features may not function as a result.

OTHER WEBSITES
1. WOLMAL contains links to other websites. This Privacy Policy only applies to this website so when you link to other websites, you should read their own privacy policies.
2. Information posted on chat rooms, forums, message boards and/or groups that we may host on this website becomes public information and you should exercise caution when deciding to disclose your personal data/information.

COPYRIGHT POLICY
1. As a WOLMAL account holder, you may submit content to wolmal.com, including videos and user comments.wolmal.com does not guarantee any confidentiality with respect to any content you submit.
2. The user shall be solely responsible for the content and the consequences of submitting and publishing his/ her content.
3. Wolmal will terminate a user’s account if, under appropriate circumstances, the user is determined to be a repeated infringer. A repeated infringer is one who has been notified of infringing activity more than twice.

CHANGES TO OUR PRIVACY POLICY
1. We will improve and add new functionality and features to this website and improve and add to our existing products, services and promotions. Because of these ongoing changes, changes in the law and the changing nature of technology, our data practices will change from time to time. If and when our data practices change, we will post the changes on our website to notify you. We encourage you to check this page frequently. If you have any queries or questions about our privacy policy or the information we hold about you, if you wish to opt out of marketing materials, to make a request for information or request the correction/ deletion of information you can contact us at the below email address.

Email: mail@wolmal.com

wolmal.com
SOCIAL E-COMMERCE   
The Unique Social Networking & Happy Shopping Medium
AN INDIAN CITIZEN LIVING IN INDIA WHO IS OF 13 YEARS OR ABOVE AGE CAN CREATE FREE ACCOUNT AND START DOING SOCIAL NETWORKING ACTIVITIES. 
WOLMAL IS A PRIVATE LIMITED COMPANY REGISTERED IN INDIA 
IDEA BEHIND THE CONCEPT
WOLMAL is the short form of the word WORLDMALL which is a VIRTUAL CONCEPT MALL,where one can find both BUYERS & SELLERS. When it reaches out to MILLIONS OF MEMBERS, there will be a big demand for putting ADVERTISEMENTS  as well as opening Online SHOWROOMS. More over it’s an opportunity for people who want to purchase day to day PRODUCTS at cheaper costs by utilizing the ACTIVITY BRIDGES  (BRIDGES are the name of VIRTUAL CURRENCY provided by WOLMAL to qualified members)  they gain while doing  prescribed SOCIAL NETWORKING ACTIVITIES inside the portal everyday. A portion of the Income received by WOLMAL  from advertisements and Commissions of  SHOWROOMs are used to provide various BRIDGES to qualified members. Members are allowed to REDEEM ACTIVITY BRIDGES against purchase of Products. Trained & Qualified members are allowed to encash EARNED BRIDGES according to their RANKS. WOLMAL provides FREE TRAININGS to selected members in different Modules and Refresher Courses also will be conducted. Members are allowed to REFER FRIENDS & FAMILY and can HELP and SUPPORT them to collect their BRIDGES.  The ultimate objective is to create it as an amazing  DIGITAL PLATFORM of Social Ecommerce where millions of PEOPLE visit every day! 
READ THE FOLLOWING TECHNICAL TERMS AND IT’S DEFINITIONS TO UNDERSTAND MORE IN DETAIL.

SHOWCASES
CONSUMERS having their FREE ACCOUNT inside wolmal.com is named as SHOWCASE. wolmal.com is a SOCIAL NETWORKING WEBSITE for the people who can unwind themselves, connect with people, communicate, share ideas & thoughts and every activity of their friends together. Let it be Business, Products, Entertainment, Life or a Social matter related with consumer activities; wolmal.com provides facility to bring all activities under one umbrella, thereby creating a unique experience of not only Social Medium but also Happy Shopping  for wolmal.com has attached a shopping portal (E Commerce) also. 
USUALLY A SHOWCASE IS ALLOTED FOR A MAXIMUM OF 5 YEARS FOR MEMBERS. IF A MEMBER COLLECTS MORE CREDIBILITY POINTS (By doing more Social Networking Activities every day) OR DESIRED NUMBER OF BUSINESS BRIDGES (By purchasing MORE PRODUCTS everymonth or Yearly); THE TERM MAY EXTEND FOR 1 OR 2 YEARS MORE.

SHOWROOMS
Wolmal.com provides a page for every Entrepreneur/Institution on creation of  STORE account which is termed as SHOWROOM. All products are displayed in the showroom as like of an Online Shopping Portal. Showrooms are meant for promoting business or service to the consumers via promoting & selling their goods and services by interacting people and to provide offers and facilities for their customers through wolmal.com. While encouraging our members (SHOWCASE OWNERS) to shop at these showrooms, wolmal.com helps these businessmen (SHOWROOM OWNERS) to acquire business. Wolmal.com is providing  options for qualified members to purchase products by utilizing the ACTIVITY BRIDGES collected every day from wolmal.com against the SOCIAL NETWORKING ACTIVITIES they performed. Showroom owners  has to pay a Monthly Rent and a commission as per agreement. (A Prescribed Application Form is available for opening Showrooms)



SHOWCASES IN DETAIL
There are 5 types of Members (SHOWCASES)
1. ORDINARY SHOWCASE OWNER (OSO) 
Beginner Member who never attended trainings. AN INDIAN CITIZEN LIVING IN INDIA WHO IS OF 13 YEARS OR ABOVE AGE CAN CREATE ACCOUNT AND IS CALLED 'ORDINARY SHOWCASE’. They are allowed to do Social Networking Activities (The prescribed LIST OF ACTIVITIES TO COLLECT ACTIVITY BRIDGES can be viewed at HELP button inside LOCKER Menu) and can collect ACTIVITY BRIDGES as GIFT and can be utilized for Purchasing Products along with INDIAN CURRENCY. (The details about How much ACTIVITY BRIDGES can be utilized is viewed when click on Quick View on PRODUCTs)  An OSO allowed to collect ACTIVITY BRIDGES but not eligible to collect EARNED BRIDGES. (To be eligible to collect EARNED BRIDGES (EB) the OSO has to attend SELECTION TRAINING SEMINAR of 3 Hours duration and the qualification criteria is of Age 25 or above and should have completed 12th standard or similar courses. After successfully completing the Selection Training Seminar, the OSO may be Upgraded as NSO)

2. NORMAL SHOWCASE OWNER (NSO) -Selected and Trained New Members
(Training Modules are of 3 Hours Duration)- Allowed to Do Maximum 100 ACTIVE HANDSHAKE REFERALS (ACTIVE HANDSHAKE means –REFERRED Members who Actually created their SHOWCASES via your Unique Referal Link which can be viewed inside HANDSHAKES Menu) within 100 days of Installation as NSO & Maximum allowed EARNED BRIDGES (EB) in a month is Rs. 10,000.

3. REGISTERED SHOWCASE OWNER (RSO) -Selected to Attend RSO Trainings (2 MODULES of 3 Hours Each) from qualified NSO’s & when successfully Completed will be announced as RSO’s.  Allowed to Do Maximum 200 ACTIVE HANDSHAKES within 200 days of Installation as  RSO & Maximum allowed EARNED BRIDGES (EB) in a month is Rs. 20,000/

4. CERTIFIED SHOWCASE OWNER (CSO)-Selected from qualified RSO’s to attend CSO trainings (2 Modules of 3 Hours Each). When successfully completed their RANK will be announced as CSO’s.  Allowed to Do Maximum 300 ACTIVE HANDSHAKES within 300 days of Installation & Maximum allowed EARNED BRIDGES (EB) in a month is Rs. 30,000.

5. CERTIFIED SHOWCASE OWNER PLUS (CSO+) Selected from qualified CSO’s to attend CSO+ training (1 Module of 3 Hour duration with an objective type written Examination of 30 Minutes duration-should have 50% marks in total and got CERTIFIED. When successfully completed their RANK will be announced as CSO’s. ('C' will be displayed along with their PROFILE NAME at the MY SHOWCASE page) Allowed to Do Maximum 500 ACTIVE HANDSHAKES within 500 days of Installation & Maximum allowed EARNED BRIDGES (EB) in a month is Rs. 50,000.
FREE TRAINING PROGRAMMES
WOLMAL has Training Centers to provide Quality Trainings in Chennai,INDIA.  And have Managers appointed in every selected Center  to train people on “What to DO?”, “How to Do?” etc and How they can earn (BRIDGES-The currency of wolmal.com) by doing activities every day via SOCIAL NETWORKING at Home as well as Online & OFFLINE Shopping. Wolmal provides FREE Trainings based on merits. 

BRIDGES (The Virtual Currency of wolmal.com)
wolmal.com allows people who have a valid Showcase to participate in the Bridges offer. BRIDGES are GIFTS provided by wolmal.com and  is not a right. By doing pre-defined activities on the wall as well as for Purchase of Products and services from the Certified Showrooms, Members can gain different types of Bridges every day and can be accumulated and then all the different eligible Bridges will be calculated for their values in INDIAN Rupees and converted to EARNED BRIDGES(EB). Purchases can be done online or directly at the shops and can collect BUSINESS BRIDGES (Bridges will be alloted only to Indian citizens who are living in INDIA- To participate in the BRIDGES PROGRAMME, it is mandatory to fill up the detailed personal information requested) By introducing BRIDGES, wolmal.com intends to support actively participating Members to improve their life style not only by making an income at home but also by using HIGH QUALITY PRODUCTS. It will boost up the sale of SHOWROOMS and their revenue also will be increased. A portion of the profits on commissions received from them will be shared among the qualified consumers against their BRIDGES. More over a portion of revenue received from ADVERTISEMENTS will also be shared among them as Bridges. 

THERE ARE 5 TYPES OF BRIDGES
1. AB-ACTIVITY BRIDGES 
2. BB-BUSINESS BRIDGES 
3. CB-COLLECTION BRIDGES 
4. DB-DIRECT BRIDGES 
5. EB-EARNED BRIDGES

A considerable percentage of the revenue from Advertisement and Promotions will be calculated yearly/quarterly /monthly or daily and will be shared and is announced as concerned BRIDGES. All these Bridges other than ACTIVITY BRIDGES (AB) together will be calculated and finally announced as EARNED BRIDGES (EB). These EARNED BRIDGES in Indian Rupees can be redeemed for PRODUCTS or can be carry forwarded or otherwise it can be encashed if permitted (as in the case of NSO/RSO/CSO/CSO+ & FRANCHISES) & else can be returned back to WOLMAL .

AB-ACTIVITY BRIDGES 
By doing pre-defined activities on the wall, (Uploading Photos & Albums, doing Comment, Share etc) a valid showcase holder can accrue ACTIVITY BRIDGES. Every day activity inside the wall may ensure good number of ACTIVITY BRIDGES and will be carry forwarded. These Bridges are called Activity Bridges (AB). “What Activities Reward Bridges?” is displayed inside the HELP button of the LOCKER Menu. ACTIVITY BRIDGES (AB) can be utilized along with Money only to purchase products as per wolmal policy.
 Eg. ILLUSTRATION A. An active SHOWCASE OWNER can do prescribed activities and collect upto 250 ACTIVITY BRIDGES as GIFT if he/she try to do all recommended activities everyday without fail. In this way he/she can collect 7500 AB in a month. So by the end of SECOND MONTH he/she will have more than 15000 AB in his/her account.(This can be viewed inside LOCKER  and a detailed list of each micro transaction also can be viewed at TRANSACTIONS Button) The Normal value of 1 Activity Bridge is Rs.1 (One Indian Rupee). So we may say that now he/she has ACTIVITY BRIDGES to the value of Rs.15000/- in his/her account. In this month if he/she wishes to purchase Groceries &other necessary products for his Home from Certified Showrooms & when he/she purchases it as online/offline for a total bill of (say for example) Rs.30,000; as per that month policy of wolmal.com, if he/she has to pay (this is just an example only) only Rs.20,000 as CASH and the balance 10,000 will be deducted by wolmal as ACTIVITY BRIDGES from his/her account. Here the CONSUMER could utilize his 10,000 ACTIVITY BRIDGES instead of paying MONEY. So he/she could SAVE (Saving Money equals Earning Money) Rs.10,000 in that month on purchase of NECESSITY PRODUCTS of every home on every month. In other way we may say that EXPENDITURE BECOME EARNINGS. Now he/she has a balance of 5000 AB in his/her account. When he/she continues to do the activities again in the third month, he/she collects again 7500 AB and the total by the end of that month will be 5000+7500=12,500 ACTIVITY BRIDGES. So again next month also he/she can purchase products as he/she did last month & continuing SAVING MONEY every month by utilizing AB. ACTIVITY BRIDGES CAN NEVER BE CONVERTED AS MONEY.

BB-BUSINESS BRIDGES
When a Showcase Owner having valid Showcase inside wolmal.com purchases products or services from the Certified Showrooms by online/offline, WOLMAL will issue 1 Bridge (BB) for every purchase worth Rs.1000 paid as CASH and this can be accumulated. This Bridge thus accrued by the consumer by PURCHASING PRODUCTS  is termed as BUSINESS BRIDGES (BB). Wolmal will be receiving commissions from those Showrooms for that month and a portion of that amount will be used to calculate the value of each BB of every month (The Value of a single BB will be between Rs.1 and Rs.100) and will be announced on or after 25th of the next month. The value of BB will vary every month since it is calculated based on the total commissions received from SHOWROOMS. 
Eg. ILLUSTRATION B: In the first example when the SHOWCASE OWNER paid Rs.20,000 as CASH, he/she is eligible to get 20 BUSINESS BRIDGES(BB’s) in that month.(OSO’s are not eligible for any BRIDGES other than AB) If the value of One BB announced for that particular month is Rs.10, he/she may get a CASH BACK of Rs.200 in his/her BB account. (This BB can be viewed inside LOCKER at the BUSINESS BRIDGES Button) The announced value of BUSINESS BRIDGEs(BB) will be added to calculate their EARNED BRIDGES (EB) of that Month. (The Formula (which is described in detail below) to Calculate EB is EB=Value of BB+CB+DB.) 

CB – COLLECTION BRIDGES (By HANDSHAKE):
HANDSHAKE is a kind of REFERAL program by which VALID SHOWCASE OWNERS can gain COLLECTION BRIDGES (CB). By inviting Friends, Relatives and Colleagues whom you know well via a link inside HANDSHAKE MENU, Members can extend HANDSHAKE to them. When it is accepted by them and signing up via that link to create FREE account (SHOWCASE)inside wolmal.com it is considered as 1 ACTIVE HANDSHAKE (Referral) is completed. A beginner(OSO) who is of age 25 or above when eligible to attend Introductory Selection Training (NSO Training) of 3 hours duration and that NSO-(Normal Showcase Owner) can have up to 100 HANDSHAKES initially. But if he/she is selected to attend RSO (Registered Showcase Owner) Training, and when it is completed successfully, he/she is eligible to do upto 200 Handshakes.  A REGISTERED SHOWCASE OWNER(RSO) when selected to attend CSO (Certified Showcase Owner) Trainings as per wolmal policy and when it is completed successfully, he/she will be announced as CSO and become eligible to do upto 300 HANDSHAKES. Likewise a CSO PLUS(CSO+) Rank Holder is allowed to do 500 Handshakes within 500 days of Installation from the date of EXAMINATION. 
When those Showcase Owners (Technically called as PARTNERS) referred by the Member of wolmal.com via HANDSHAKES  can make BUSINESS BRIDGES (BB) by purchasing  PRODUCTS, the person who did that HANDSHAKE REFERRAL is eligible for 50% of their BUSINESS BRIDGES (BB). These Bridges he/she gained from every HANDSHAKE PARTNER is termed as COLLECTION BRIDGES (CB). (To be eligible for CB, one should have minimum 1 BB in that particular month. CB will be allotted to eligible members for a maximum of continuous 5 years or 60 full calendar months)
Eg. ILLUSTRATION C: Assume that a MEMBER has been selected to attend RSO, CSO & CSO+ training modules and completed successfully to become a CERTIFIED SHOWCASE OWNER PLUS with a “C” displayed along with his/her profile name at MY SHOWCASE PROFILE page AND IF HE/SHE COMPLETED ALL THE ALLOWED 500 ACTIVE HANDSHAKES: Assume as per previous example, he/she purchased 30,000 worth products and paid 20,000 as cash (Balance as AB) and thereby received 20 BB; all his/her referred (ACTIVE HANDSHAKE) 500 members also did the same type of purchase and saved Rs.10,000 and collected 20 BB’s. Now he/she is eligible for 50% of those BB’s as COLLECTION BRIDGES (CB). So from a single member, he/she gets 10CB (50% of 20 BB) and thus a total of 5000 COLLECTION BRIDGES (CB) accrued in that month (500 Members X 10CB = 5000CB). Since the value of BB announced is Rs.10 in that month, the value of CB will also be the same (Wolmal has decided that BB,CB & DB will hold same value in every month. So no need of separate announcement needed) By the above illustration the total amount he/she gain from CB @ Rs.10 for that month is Rs. 50,000. (5000 CB x Rs.10=Rs.50,000) 

DB-DIRECT BRIDGES
 These Bridges are exclusive Bridges alloted by Wolmal directly to FRANCHISES (CENTERS) who have done extra miles for promoting the portal.  DIRECT BRIDGES  are Calculated As 10% of COLLECTION BRIDGES(CB) of all Active Handshakes  Referred By the CENTER OWNER (OSO’s NSO’s, RSO’s, CSO’s & CSO+ are not eligible for DB). Franchise People(CENTER OWNERS) will be trained separately to improve Leadership Skills so as to develop their business by taking care of their partners successfully. They must ensure that their HANDSHAKE PARTNERS get a decent income.
Eg. ILLUSTRATION D: Assume that a Member has been selected as Franchise and all his/her ACTIVE HANDSHAKES are having 100 CB in a particular month, then he/she is eligible for 10% of CB (10% 100 is 10DB) ie. 10 DB from each ACTIVE SHOWCASE OWNER. The value of this DB will also be the same as of the announced value of BB. If he/she is getting 10 DB from 1000 Members (as in the case of a WBC franchise) , then his/her total DB will be 10,000 and if the value of BB announced is just Rs. 10; his/her income from DB will be Rs.1 Lakh (if eligible as per criteria) in that particular month.

EB-EARNED BRIDGES 
The value of Bridges BB,CB,& DB will be calculated and announced on or after 25th of EVERY NEXT MONTH of ACTUAL BUSINESS MONTH in Indian Rupees and will be announced as EARNED BRIDGES (EB) of that SHOWCASE OWNER. The formula to calculate EB is EB=Value of BB+CB+DB.  (The value of One EB will be One INDIAN RUPEE) EB can be redeemed for PRODUCTS from recommended CERTIFIED SHOWROOMS by Qualified SHOWCASE OWNERs. NSO/RSO/CSO/CSO+ & FRANCHISES(CENTERS) can request wolmal to convert EARNED BRIDGES (EB) to Money (CASH in INDIAN CURRENCY through BANK ACCOUNTS-provided BANK ACCOUNT & PAN CARD DETAILS should be furnished in advance) and after deducting Taxes(TDS) as per Government Rules, the Balance will be credited to their Bank account. 
Eg. ILLUSTRATION E: If a CSO PLUS Rank Holder has 20 BB’s, 5000 CB’s (as per all the above examples) and Zero DB’s (only FRANCHISE CENTERS are eligible for DB’s), his/her EB for this month is calculated as follows. The formula to calculate EB is EB=Value of BB+CB+DB. So here value of 20BB has been calculated as Rs.200 and of 5000 CB as 50,000. Hence EB= 200 + 50,000 + 0 = 50,200. As per Rule of Wolmal, a CSO PLUS member is allowed to Earn maximum Rs.50,000 only in a month. So here he/she can request to withdraw upto 50,000 as CASH in that month to his/her Bank Account. The surplus amount of Rs. 200 will go back to WOLMAL.
Eg. ILLUSTRATION E (1) In all the above examples the value of 1 BB is given as Rs.10. If it is announced as Rs.20, the EB has to be calculated as EB=Value of BB+CB+DB. BB=Rs.400, CB= 1,000,00, DB=0. So 400+1,000,00+0=1,00400. Here as per rule, a CSO PLUS is allowed to earn maximum 50,000 only: so the EB credited to his/her account will be 50,000 and the balance will go back to Wolmal. (In these situations Members may apply for FRANCHISE CENTERS to Gain the Full Amount).  To Earn Money, All Members have to inform the bank account details requested and also should fill up PAN Card Number. More over either Passport or Aadhar /Voter ID Number also should be filled in the space provided at Personal Information at MY ACCOUNTS menu. 


FRANCHISES OF WOLMAL
To start a FRNCHISE CENTER, eligible member has to Submit the Prescribed Filled application form in advance and if selected and allotted, has to Pay the FRANCHISE LICENCE FEE (NON REFUNDABLE) at the Bank Account of WOLMAL and an AGREEMENT in STAMP PAPER (in Duplicate) also has to be submitted by the Member.
ALL FRANCHISE CENTERS ARE ELIGIBLE TO EARN 20% COMMISSIONS ON PAID ADVERTISEMENTS WHICH THEY COLLECTED AND SUBMITTED TO wolmal.com.
There are 3 Types of FRANCHISEs- 
1. MICRO FRANCHISE
2. MINI FRANCHISE
3. MASTER FRANCHISE
MICRO FRANCHISEs: 
CAN START AT HOME.   At least A TABLE SPACE IS REQUIRED.
2 TYPES of MICRO FRANCHISES.
(1)  WOLMAL AFFILIATE CENTER (WAC) 
(2)  WOLMAL BUSINESS CENTER (WBC)

WOLMAL AFFILIATE CENTER (WAC):
 Allowed to do upto 500 HANDSHAKES within the agreement period of 5 Years(60 Months) and the Maximum Income Limit in a month will be Rs. 1 lakh. The AFFILIATE CENTER is authorised to train and motivate all these 500 PARTNERS to collect their AB, BB & CB and to make sure that they earn a decent income as per their criteria. 
Here the FRANCHISE GAINS DIRECT BRIDGES WHICH WILL BE 10% OF THE CB OF Active PARTNERS.

WOLMAL BUSINESS CENTER (WBC): 
Allowed to do upto 1000 HANDSHAKES within the agreement period of 5 Years(60 Months) and the Maximum Income Limit in a month will be Rs. 2 lakh. The BUSINESS CENTER is authorised to train and motivate all these 1000 PARTNERS to collect their AB, BB & CB and to make sure that they earn a decent income as per their criteria. 
Here the FRANCHISE GAINS DIRECT BRIDGES WHICH WILL BE 10% OF THE CB OF Active PARTNERS.

Eg. ILLUSTRATION F1: INCOME OF WOLMAL BUSINESS CENTER (WBC)
When this Micro Franchise WBC did 1000 Handshakes and all 1000 partners purchase(example) Rs.3000 worth GROCERIES by paying an amount of Rs. 2000 and the balance 1000 paid as AB in this month, all 1000 people and the Franchise owner also gain 2 BB each. So the CB gained by FRANCHISE OWNER will be 1000 (50% of BB of all 1000 ie. 1BB x 1000 =1000 CB). The Franchise is eligible to gain DB also. DB will be 10% of the CB's of all 1000 partners. for example;If the CB of all partners are (example) 100, then FRANCHISE (WBC) is eligible to gain 10% ie 10 DB from each and the total DB will be 10,000 (10x1000=10,000). If the value announced for BB in that month is Rs. 20, the EB will be calculated by the following method. 
EB = VALUE of BB+CB+DB. 
So 2x Rs.20 + 1000 x Rs.20 + 10,000 x Rs. 20= 40 + 20,000 + 2,00,000 = Rs. 2,20,040/-
Since the WOLMAL BUSINESS CENTER(WBC) is eligible only for Rs. 2 lakh in a month, the balance Rs.20,040/- will go back to Wolmal and this TWO LAKH will be deposited in his/her EARNED BRIDGES Box and he/she may request Wolmal to credit the amount to the BANK ACCOUNT after deducting TDS. This may continue and every month & the same BUSINESS may happen and can earn the amount every month for UPTO 5 years (60 Months as per agreement). (To gain EARNED BRIDGES in a month, the MEMBER should have at least 1 BB in that particular month.)

HAVE A LOOK AT THE SCIENCE BEHIND THE IDEA OF WOLMAL.COM SOCIAL ECOMMERCE BELOW

wolmal.com
SOCIAL E-COMMERCE   
The Unique Social Networking & Happy Shopping Medium
AN INDIAN CITIZEN LIVING IN INDIA WHO IS OF 13 YEARS OR ABOVE AGE CAN CREATE FREE ACCOUNT AND START DOING SOCIAL NETWORKING ACTIVITIES. 
WOLMAL IS A PRIVATE LIMITED COMPANY REGISTERED IN INDIA 
IDEA BEHIND THE CONCEPT
WOLMAL is the short form of the word WORLDMALL which is a VIRTUAL CONCEPT MALL,where one can find both BUYERS & SELLERS. When it reaches out to MILLIONS OF MEMBERS, there will be a big demand for putting ADVERTISEMENTS  as well as opening Online SHOWROOMS. More over it’s an opportunity for people who want to purchase day to day PRODUCTS at cheaper costs by utilizing the ACTIVITY BRIDGES  (BRIDGES are the name of VIRTUAL CURRENCY provided by WOLMAL to qualified members)  they gain while doing  prescribed SOCIAL NETWORKING ACTIVITIES inside the portal everyday. A portion of the Income received by WOLMAL  from advertisements and Commissions of  SHOWROOMs are used to provide various BRIDGES to qualified members. Members are allowed to REDEEM ACTIVITY BRIDGES against purchase of Products. Trained & Qualified members are allowed to encash EARNED BRIDGES according to their RANKS. WOLMAL provides FREE TRAININGS to selected members in different Modules and Refresher Courses also will be conducted. Members are allowed to REFER FRIENDS & FAMILY and can HELP and SUPPORT them to collect their BRIDGES.  The ultimate objective is to create it as an amazing  DIGITAL PLATFORM of Social Ecommerce where millions of PEOPLE visit every day! 
READ THE FOLLOWING TECHNICAL TERMS AND IT’S DEFINITIONS TO UNDERSTAND MORE IN DETAIL.

SHOWCASES
CONSUMERS having their FREE ACCOUNT inside wolmal.com is named as SHOWCASE. wolmal.com is a SOCIAL NETWORKING WEBSITE for the people who can unwind themselves, connect with people, communicate, share ideas & thoughts and every activity of their friends together. Let it be Business, Products, Entertainment, Life or a Social matter related with consumer activities; wolmal.com provides facility to bring all activities under one umbrella, thereby creating a unique experience of not only Social Medium but also Happy Shopping  for wolmal.com has attached a shopping portal (E Commerce) also. 
USUALLY A SHOWCASE IS ALLOTED FOR A MAXIMUM OF 5 YEARS FOR MEMBERS. IF A MEMBER COLLECTS MORE CREDIBILITY POINTS (By doing more Social Networking Activities every day) OR DESIRED NUMBER OF BUSINESS BRIDGES (By purchasing MORE PRODUCTS everymonth or Yearly); THE TERM MAY EXTEND FOR 1 OR 2 YEARS MORE.

SHOWROOMS
Wolmal.com provides a page for every Entrepreneur/Institution on creation of  STORE account which is termed as SHOWROOM. All products are displayed in the showroom as like of an Online Shopping Portal. Showrooms are meant for promoting business or service to the consumers via promoting & selling their goods and services by interacting people and to provide offers and facilities for their customers through wolmal.com. While encouraging our members (SHOWCASE OWNERS) to shop at these showrooms, wolmal.com helps these businessmen (SHOWROOM OWNERS) to acquire business. Wolmal.com is providing  options for qualified members to purchase products by utilizing the ACTIVITY BRIDGES collected every day from wolmal.com against the SOCIAL NETWORKING ACTIVITIES they performed. Showroom owners  has to pay a Monthly Rent and a commission as per agreement. (A Prescribed Application Form is available for opening Showrooms)



SHOWCASES IN DETAIL
There are 5 types of Members (SHOWCASES)
1. ORDINARY SHOWCASE OWNER (OSO) 
Beginner Member who never attended trainings. AN INDIAN CITIZEN LIVING IN INDIA WHO IS OF 13 YEARS OR ABOVE AGE CAN CREATE ACCOUNT AND IS CALLED 'ORDINARY SHOWCASE’. They are allowed to do Social Networking Activities (The prescribed LIST OF ACTIVITIES TO COLLECT ACTIVITY BRIDGES can be viewed at HELP button inside LOCKER Menu) and can collect ACTIVITY BRIDGES as GIFT and can be utilized for Purchasing Products along with INDIAN CURRENCY. (The details about How much ACTIVITY BRIDGES can be utilized is viewed when click on Quick View on PRODUCTs)  An OSO allowed to collect ACTIVITY BRIDGES but not eligible to collect EARNED BRIDGES. (To be eligible to collect EARNED BRIDGES (EB) the OSO has to attend SELECTION TRAINING SEMINAR of 3 Hours duration and the qualification criteria is of Age 25 or above and should have completed 12th standard or similar courses. After successfully completing the Selection Training Seminar, the OSO may be Upgraded as NSO)

2. NORMAL SHOWCASE OWNER (NSO) -Selected and Trained New Members
(Training Modules are of 3 Hours Duration)- Allowed to Do Maximum 100 ACTIVE HANDSHAKE REFERALS (ACTIVE HANDSHAKE means –REFERRED Members who Actually created their SHOWCASES via your Unique Referal Link which can be viewed inside HANDSHAKES Menu) within 100 days of Installation as NSO & Maximum allowed EARNED BRIDGES (EB) in a month is Rs. 10,000.

3. REGISTERED SHOWCASE OWNER (RSO) -Selected to Attend RSO Trainings (2 MODULES of 3 Hours Each) from qualified NSO’s & when successfully Completed will be announced as RSO’s.  Allowed to Do Maximum 200 ACTIVE HANDSHAKES within 200 days of Installation as  RSO & Maximum allowed EARNED BRIDGES (EB) in a month is Rs. 20,000/

4. CERTIFIED SHOWCASE OWNER (CSO)-Selected from qualified RSO’s to attend CSO trainings (2 Modules of 3 Hours Each). When successfully completed their RANK will be announced as CSO’s.  Allowed to Do Maximum 300 ACTIVE HANDSHAKES within 300 days of Installation & Maximum allowed EARNED BRIDGES (EB) in a month is Rs. 30,000.

5. CERTIFIED SHOWCASE OWNER PLUS (CSO+) Selected from qualified CSO’s to attend CSO+ training (1 Module of 3 Hour duration with an objective type written Examination of 30 Minutes duration-should have 50% marks in total and got CERTIFIED. When successfully completed their RANK will be announced as CSO’s. ('C' will be displayed along with their PROFILE NAME at the MY SHOWCASE page) Allowed to Do Maximum 500 ACTIVE HANDSHAKES within 500 days of Installation & Maximum allowed EARNED BRIDGES (EB) in a month is Rs. 50,000.
FREE TRAINING PROGRAMMES
WOLMAL has Training Centers to provide Quality Trainings in Chennai,INDIA.  And have Managers appointed in every selected Center  to train people on “What to DO?”, “How to Do?” etc and How they can earn (BRIDGES-The currency of wolmal.com) by doing activities every day via SOCIAL NETWORKING at Home as well as Online & OFFLINE Shopping. Wolmal provides FREE Trainings based on merits. 

BRIDGES (The Virtual Currency of wolmal.com)
wolmal.com allows people who have a valid Showcase to participate in the Bridges offer. BRIDGES are GIFTS provided by wolmal.com and  is not a right. By doing pre-defined activities on the wall as well as for Purchase of Products and services from the Certified Showrooms, Members can gain different types of Bridges every day and can be accumulated and then all the different eligible Bridges will be calculated for their values in INDIAN Rupees and converted to EARNED BRIDGES(EB). Purchases can be done online or directly at the shops and can collect BUSINESS BRIDGES (Bridges will be alloted only to Indian citizens who are living in INDIA- To participate in the BRIDGES PROGRAMME, it is mandatory to fill up the detailed personal information requested) By introducing BRIDGES, wolmal.com intends to support actively participating Members to improve their life style not only by making an income at home but also by using HIGH QUALITY PRODUCTS. It will boost up the sale of SHOWROOMS and their revenue also will be increased. A portion of the profits on commissions received from them will be shared among the qualified consumers against their BRIDGES. More over a portion of revenue received from ADVERTISEMENTS will also be shared among them as Bridges. 

THERE ARE 5 TYPES OF BRIDGES
1. AB-ACTIVITY BRIDGES 
2. BB-BUSINESS BRIDGES 
3. CB-COLLECTION BRIDGES 
4. DB-DIRECT BRIDGES 
5. EB-EARNED BRIDGES

A considerable percentage of the revenue from Advertisement and Promotions will be calculated yearly/quarterly /monthly or daily and will be shared and is announced as concerned BRIDGES. All these Bridges other than ACTIVITY BRIDGES (AB) together will be calculated and finally announced as EARNED BRIDGES (EB). These EARNED BRIDGES in Indian Rupees can be redeemed for PRODUCTS or can be carry forwarded or otherwise it can be encashed if permitted (as in the case of NSO/RSO/CSO/CSO+ & FRANCHISES) & else can be returned back to WOLMAL .

If he/she is getting 10 DB from 1000 Members (as in the case of a WBC franchise) , then his/her total DB will be 10,000 and if the value of BB announced is just Rs. 10; his/her income from DB will be Rs.1 Lakh (if eligible as per criteria) in that particular month.

EB-EARNED BRIDGES 
The value of Bridges BB,CB,& DB will be calculated and announced on or after 25th of EVERY NEXT MONTH of ACTUAL BUSINESS MONTH in Indian Rupees and will be announced as EARNED BRIDGES (EB) of that SHOWCASE OWNER. The formula to calculate EB is EB=Value of BB+CB+DB.  (The value of One EB will be One INDIAN RUPEE) EB can be redeemed for PRODUCTS from recommended CERTIFIED SHOWROOMS by Qualified SHOWCASE OWNERs. NSO/RSO/CSO/CSO+ & FRANCHISES(CENTERS) can request wolmal to convert EARNED BRIDGES (EB) to Money (CASH in INDIAN CURRENCY through BANK ACCOUNTS-provided BANK ACCOUNT & PAN CARD DETAILS should be furnished in advance) and after deducting Taxes(TDS) as per Government Rules, the Balance will be credited to their Bank account. 
Eg. ILLUSTRATION E: If a CSO PLUS Rank Holder has 20 BB’s, 5000 CB’s (as per all the above examples) and Zero DB’s (only FRANCHISE CENTERS are eligible for DB’s), his/her EB for this month is calculated as follows. The formula to calculate EB is EB=Value of BB+CB+DB. So here value of 20BB has been calculated as Rs.200 and of 5000 CB as 50,000. Hence EB= 200 + 50,000 + 0 = 50,200. As per Rule of Wolmal, a CSO PLUS member is allowed to Earn maximum Rs.50,000 only in a month. So here he/she can request to withdraw upto 50,000 as CASH in that month to his/her Bank Account. The surplus amount of Rs. 200 will go back to WOLMAL.
Eg. ILLUSTRATION E (1) In all the above examples the value of 1 BB is given as Rs.10. If it is announced as Rs.20, the EB has to be calculated as EB=Value of BB+CB+DB. BB=Rs.400, CB= 1,000,00, DB=0. So 400+1,000,00+0=1,00400. Here as per rule, a CSO PLUS is allowed to earn maximum 50,000 only: so the EB credited to his/her account will be 50,000 and the balance will go back to Wolmal. (In these situations Members may apply for FRANCHISE CENTERS to Gain the Full Amount).  To Earn Money, All Members have to inform the bank account details requested and also should fill up PAN Card Number. More over either Passport or Aadhar /Voter ID Number also should be filled in the space provided at Personal Information at MY ACCOUNTS menu. 


FRANCHISES OF WOLMAL
To start a FRNCHISE CENTER, eligible member has to Submit the Prescribed Filled application form in advance and if selected and allotted, has to Pay the FRANCHISE LICENCE FEE (NON REFUNDABLE) at the Bank Account of WOLMAL and an AGREEMENT in STAMP PAPER (in Duplicate) also has to be submitted by the Member.
ALL FRANCHISE CENTERS ARE ELIGIBLE TO EARN 20% COMMISSIONS ON PAID ADVERTISEMENTS WHICH THEY COLLECTED AND SUBMITTED TO wolmal.com.
There are 3 Types of FRANCHISEs- 
1. MICRO FRANCHISE
2. MINI FRANCHISE
3. MASTER FRANCHISE
MICRO FRANCHISEs: 
CAN START AT HOME.   At least A TABLE SPACE IS REQUIRED.
2 TYPES of MICRO FRANCHISES.
(1)  WOLMAL AFFILIATE CENTER (WAC) 
(2)  WOLMAL BUSINESS CENTER (WBC)

WOLMAL AFFILIATE CENTER (WAC):
 Allowed to do upto 500 HANDSHAKES within the agreement period of 5 Years(60 Months) and the Maximum Income Limit in a month will be Rs. 1 lakh. The AFFILIATE CENTER is authorised to train and motivate all these 500 PARTNERS to collect their AB, BB & CB and to make sure that they earn a decent income as per their criteria. 
Here the FRANCHISE GAINS DIRECT BRIDGES WHICH WILL BE 10% OF THE CB OF Active PARTNERS.

WOLMAL BUSINESS CENTER (WBC): 
Allowed to do upto 1000 HANDSHAKES within the agreement period of 5 Years(60 Months) and the Maximum Income Limit in a month will be Rs. 2 lakh. The BUSINESS CENTER is authorised to train and motivate all these 1000 PARTNERS to collect their AB, BB & CB and to make sure that they earn a decent income as per their criteria. 
Here the FRANCHISE GAINS DIRECT BRIDGES WHICH WILL BE 10% OF THE CB OF Active PARTNERS.

Eg. ILLUSTRATION F1: INCOME OF WOLMAL BUSINESS CENTER (WBC)
When this Micro Franchise WBC did 1000 Handshakes and all 1000 partners purchase(example) Rs.3000 worth GROCERIES by paying an amount of Rs. 2000 and the balance 1000 paid as AB in this month, all 1000 people and the Franchise owner also gain 2 BB each. So the CB gained by FRANCHISE OWNER will be 1000 (50% of BB of all 1000 ie. 1BB x 1000 =1000 CB). The Franchise is eligible to gain DB also. DB will be 10% of the CB's of all 1000 partners. for example;If the CB of all partners are (example) 100, then FRANCHISE (WBC) is eligible to gain 10% ie 10 DB from each and the total DB will be 10,000 (10x1000=10,000). If the value announced for BB in that month is Rs. 20, the EB will be calculated by the following method. 
EB = VALUE of BB+CB+DB. 
So 2x Rs.20 + 1000 x Rs.20 + 10,000 x Rs. 20= 40 + 20,000 + 2,00,000 = Rs. 2,20,040/-
Since the WOLMAL BUSINESS CENTER(WBC) is eligible only for Rs. 2 lakh in a month, the balance Rs.20,040/- will go back to Wolmal and this TWO LAKH will be deposited in his/her EARNED BRIDGES Box and he/she may request Wolmal to credit the amount to the BANK ACCOUNT after deducting TDS. This may continue and every month & the same BUSINESS may happen and can earn the amount every month for UPTO 5 years (60 Months as per agreement). (To gain EARNED BRIDGES in a month, the MEMBER should have at least 1 BB in that particular month.)

DISCLAIMER: Earnings & Income will be directly proportionate to the Efforts & Hard work by Members.
Wolmal doesn't guarantee any amount for any activity or work done by members. The Illustrations above are only an indication for demonstration purpose.

IDEA BEHIND THE CONCEPT
WOLMAL is the short form of the word WORLDMALL which is a VIRTUAL CONCEPT MALL,where one can find both BUYERS & SELLERS. When it reaches out to MILLIONS OF MEMBERS, there will be a big demand for putting ADVERTISEMENTS  as well as opening Online SHOWROOMS. More over it’s an opportunity for people who want to purchase day to day PRODUCTS at cheaper costs by utilizing the ACTIVITY BRIDGES  (BRIDGES are the name of VIRTUAL CURRENCY provided by WOLMAL to qualified members)  they gain while doing  prescribed SOCIAL NETWORKING ACTIVITIES inside the portal everyday. A portion of the Income received by WOLMAL  from advertisements and Commissions of  SHOWROOMs are used to provide various BRIDGES to qualified members. Members are allowed to REDEEM ACTIVITY BRIDGES against purchase of Products. Trained & Qualified members are allowed to encash EARNED BRIDGES according to their RANKS. WOLMAL provides FREE TRAININGS to selected members in different Modules and Refresher Courses also will be conducted. Members are allowed to REFER FRIENDS & FAMILY and can HELP and SUPPORT them to collect their BRIDGES.  The ultimate objective is to create it as an amazing  DIGITAL PLATFORM of Social Ecommerce where millions of PEOPLE visit every day! 
READ THE FOLLOWING TECHNICAL TERMS AND IT’S DEFINITIONS TO UNDERSTAND MORE IN DETAIL.

SHOWCASES
CONSUMERS having their FREE ACCOUNT inside wolmal.com is named as SHOWCASE. wolmal.com is a SOCIAL NETWORKING WEBSITE for the people who can unwind themselves, connect with people, communicate, share ideas & thoughts and every activity of their friends together. Let it be Business, Products, Entertainment, Life or a Social matter related with consumer activities; wolmal.com provides facility to bring all activities under one umbrella, thereby creating a unique experience of not only Social Medium but also Happy Shopping  for wolmal.com has attached a shopping portal (E Commerce) also. 
USUALLY A SHOWCASE IS ALLOTED FOR A MAXIMUM OF 5 YEARS FOR MEMBERS. IF A MEMBER COLLECTS MORE CREDIBILITY POINTS (By doing more Social Networking Activities every day) OR DESIRED NUMBER OF BUSINESS BRIDGES (By purchasing MORE PRODUCTS everymonth or Yearly); THE TERM MAY EXTEND FOR 1 OR 2 YEARS MORE.

SHOWROOMS
Wolmal.com provides a page for every Entrepreneur/Institution on creation of  STORE account which is termed as SHOWROOM. All products are displayed in the showroom as like of an Online Shopping Portal. Showrooms are meant for promoting business or service to the consumers via promoting & selling their goods and services by interacting people and to provide offers and facilities for their customers through wolmal.com. While encouraging our members (SHOWCASE OWNERS) to shop at these showrooms, wolmal.com helps these businessmen (SHOWROOM OWNERS) to acquire business. Wolmal.com is providing  options for qualified members to purchase products by utilizing the ACTIVITY BRIDGES collected every day from wolmal.com against the SOCIAL NETWORKING ACTIVITIES they performed. Showroom owners  has to pay a Monthly Rent and a commission as per agreement. (A Prescribed Application Form is available for opening Showrooms)



SHOWCASES IN DETAIL
There are 5 types of Members (SHOWCASES)
1. ORDINARY SHOWCASE OWNER (OSO) 
Beginner Member who never attended trainings. AN INDIAN CITIZEN LIVING IN INDIA WHO IS OF 13 YEARS OR ABOVE AGE CAN CREATE ACCOUNT AND IS CALLED 'ORDINARY SHOWCASE’. They are allowed to do Social Networking Activities (The prescribed LIST OF ACTIVITIES TO COLLECT ACTIVITY BRIDGES can be viewed at HELP button inside LOCKER Menu) and can collect ACTIVITY BRIDGES as GIFT and can be utilized for Purchasing Products along with INDIAN CURRENCY. (The details about How much ACTIVITY BRIDGES can be utilized is viewed when click on Quick View on PRODUCTs)  An OSO allowed to collect ACTIVITY BRIDGES but not eligible to collect EARNED BRIDGES. (To be eligible to collect EARNED BRIDGES (EB) the OSO has to attend SELECTION TRAINING SEMINAR of 3 Hours duration and the qualification criteria is of Age 21 or above and should have completed 12th standard or similar courses. After successfully completing the Selection Training Seminar, the OSO may be Upgraded as NSO)

2. NORMAL SHOWCASE OWNER (NSO) -Selected and Trained New Members
(Training Modules are of 3 Hours Duration)- Allowed to Do Maximum 100 ACTIVE HANDSHAKE REFERALS (ACTIVE HANDSHAKE means –REFERRED Members who Actually created their SHOWCASES via your Unique Referal Link which can be viewed inside HANDSHAKES Menu) within 100 days of Installation as NSO & Maximum allowed EARNED BRIDGES (EB) in a month is Rs. 10,000.

3. REGISTERED SHOWCASE OWNER (RSO) -Selected to Attend RSO Trainings (2 MODULES of 3 Hours Each) from qualified NSO’s & when successfully Completed will be announced as RSO’s.  Allowed to Do Maximum 200 ACTIVE HANDSHAKES within 200 days of Installation as  RSO & Maximum allowed EARNED BRIDGES (EB) in a month is Rs. 20,000/

4. CERTIFIED SHOWCASE OWNER (CSO)-Selected from qualified RSO’s to attend CSO trainings (2 Modules of 3 Hours Each). When successfully completed their RANK will be announced as CSO’s.  Allowed to Do Maximum 300 ACTIVE HANDSHAKES within 300 days of Installation & Maximum allowed EARNED BRIDGES (EB) in a month is Rs. 30,000.

5. CERTIFIED SHOWCASE OWNER PLUS (CSO+) Selected from qualified CSO’s to attend CSO+ training (1 Module of 3 Hour duration with an objective type written Examination of 30 Minutes duration-should have 50% marks in total and got CERTIFIED. When successfully completed their RANK will be announced as CSO’s. ('C' will be displayed along with their PROFILE NAME at the MY SHOWCASE page) Allowed to Do Maximum 500 ACTIVE HANDSHAKES within 500 days of Installation & Maximum allowed EARNED BRIDGES (EB) in a month is Rs. 50,000.
FREE TRAINING PROGRAMMES
WOLMAL has Training Centers to provide Quality Trainings in Chennai,INDIA.  And have Managers appointed in every selected Center  to train people on “What to DO?”, “How to Do?” etc and How they can earn (BRIDGES-The currency of wolmal.com) by doing activities every day via SOCIAL NETWORKING at Home as well as Online & OFFLINE Shopping. Wolmal provides FREE Trainings based on merits. 

BRIDGES (The Virtual Currency of wolmal.com)
wolmal.com allows people who have a valid Showcase to participate in the Bridges offer. BRIDGES are GIFTS provided by wolmal.com and  is not a right. By doing pre-defined activities on the wall as well as for Purchase of Products and services from the Certified Showrooms, Members can gain different types of Bridges every day and can be accumulated and then all the different eligible Bridges will be calculated for their values in INDIAN Rupees and converted to EARNED BRIDGES(EB). Purchases can be done online or directly at the shops and can collect BUSINESS BRIDGES (Bridges will be alloted only to Indian citizens who are living in INDIA- To participate in the BRIDGES PROGRAMME, it is mandatory to fill up the detailed personal information requested) By introducing BRIDGES, wolmal.com intends to support actively participating Members to improve their life style not only by making an income at home but also by using HIGH QUALITY PRODUCTS. It will boost up the sale of SHOWROOMS and their revenue also will be increased. A portion of the profits on commissions received from them will be shared among the qualified consumers against their BRIDGES. More over a portion of revenue received from ADVERTISEMENTS will also be shared among them as Bridges. 

THERE ARE 5 TYPES OF BRIDGES
1. AB-ACTIVITY BRIDGES 
2. BB-BUSINESS BRIDGES 
3. CB-COLLECTION BRIDGES 
4. DB-DIRECT BRIDGES 
5. EB-EARNED BRIDGES

A considerable percentage of the revenue from Advertisement and Promotions will be calculated yearly/quarterly /monthly or daily and will be shared and is announced as concerned BRIDGES. All these Bridges other than ACTIVITY BRIDGES (AB) together will be calculated and finally announced as EARNED BRIDGES (EB). These EARNED BRIDGES in Indian Rupees can be redeemed for PRODUCTS or can be carry forwarded or otherwise it can be encashed if permitted (as in the case of NSO/RSO/CSO/CSO+ & FRANCHISES) & else can be returned back to WOLMAL .

AB-ACTIVITY BRIDGES 
By doing pre-defined activities on the wall, (Uploading Photos & Albums, doing Comment, Share etc) a valid showcase holder can accrue ACTIVITY BRIDGES. Every day activity inside the wall may ensure good number of ACTIVITY BRIDGES and will be carry forwarded. These Bridges are called Activity Bridges (AB). “What Activities Reward Bridges?” is displayed inside the HELP button of the LOCKER Menu. ACTIVITY BRIDGES (AB) can be utilized along with Money only to purchase products as per wolmal policy.
 Eg. ILLUSTRATION A. An active SHOWCASE OWNER can do prescribed activities and collect upto 250 ACTIVITY BRIDGES as GIFT if he/she try to do all recommended activities everyday without fail. In this way he/she can collect 7500 AB in a month. So by the end of SECOND MONTH he/she will have more than 15000 AB in his/her account.(This can be viewed inside LOCKER  and a detailed list of each micro transaction also can be viewed at TRANSACTIONS Button) The Normal value of 1 Activity Bridge is Rs.1 (One Indian Rupee). So we may say that now he/she has ACTIVITY BRIDGES to the value of Rs.15000/- in his/her account. In this month if he/she wishes to purchase Groceries &other necessary products for his Home from Certified Showrooms & when he/she purchases it as online/offline for a total bill of (say for example) Rs.30,000; as per that month policy of wolmal.com, if he/she has to pay (this is just an example only) only Rs.20,000 as CASH and the balance 10,000 will be deducted by wolmal as ACTIVITY BRIDGES from his/her account. Here the CONSUMER could utilize his 10,000 ACTIVITY BRIDGES instead of paying MONEY. So he/she could SAVE (Saving Money equals Earning Money) Rs.10,000 in that month on purchase of NECESSITY PRODUCTS of every home on every month. In other way we may say that EXPENDITURE BECOME EARNINGS. Now he/she has a balance of 5000 AB in his/her account. When he/she continues to do the activities again in the third month, he/she collects again 7500 AB and the total by the end of that month will be 5000+7500=12,500 ACTIVITY BRIDGES. So again next month also he/she can purchase products as he/she did last month & continuing SAVING MONEY every month by utilizing AB. ACTIVITY BRIDGES CAN NEVER BE CONVERTED AS MONEY.

BB-BUSINESS BRIDGES
When a Showcase Owner having valid Showcase inside wolmal.com purchases products or services from the Certified Showrooms by online/offline, WOLMAL will issue 1 Bridge (BB) for every purchase worth Rs.1000 paid as CASH and this can be accumulated. This Bridge thus accrued by the consumer by PURCHASING PRODUCTS  is termed as BUSINESS BRIDGES (BB). Wolmal will be receiving commissions from those Showrooms for that month and a portion of that amount will be used to calculate the value of each BB of every month (The Value of a single BB will be between Rs.1 and Rs.100) and will be announced on or after 25th of the next month. The value of BB will vary every month since it is calculated based on the total commissions received from SHOWROOMS. 
Eg. ILLUSTRATION B: In the first example when the SHOWCASE OWNER paid Rs.20,000 as CASH, he/she is eligible to get 20 BUSINESS BRIDGES(BB’s) in that month.(OSO’s are not eligible for any BRIDGES other than AB) If the value of One BB announced for that particular month is Rs.10, he/she may get a CASH BACK of Rs.200 in his/her BB account. (This BB can be viewed inside LOCKER at the BUSINESS BRIDGES Button) The announced value of BUSINESS BRIDGEs(BB) will be added to calculate their EARNED BRIDGES (EB) of that Month. (The Formula (which is described in detail below) to Calculate EB is EB=Value of BB+CB+DB.) 

CB – COLLECTION BRIDGES (By HANDSHAKE):
HANDSHAKE is a kind of REFERAL program by which VALID SHOWCASE OWNERS can gain COLLECTION BRIDGES (CB). By inviting Friends, Relatives and Colleagues whom you know well via a link inside HANDSHAKE MENU, Members can extend HANDSHAKE to them. When it is accepted by them and signing up via that link to create FREE account (SHOWCASE)inside wolmal.com it is considered as 1 ACTIVE HANDSHAKE (Referral) is completed. A beginner(OSO) who is of age 25 or above when eligible to attend Introductory Selection Training (NSO Training) of 3 hours duration and that NSO-(Normal Showcase Owner) can have up to 100 HANDSHAKES initially. But if he/she is selected to attend RSO (Registered Showcase Owner) Training, and when it is completed successfully, he/she is eligible to do upto 200 Handshakes.  A REGISTERED SHOWCASE OWNER(RSO) when selected to attend CSO (Certified Showcase Owner) Trainings as per wolmal policy and when it is completed successfully, he/she will be announced as CSO and become eligible to do upto 300 HANDSHAKES. Likewise a CSO PLUS(CSO+) Rank Holder is allowed to do 500 Handshakes within 500 days of Installation from the date of EXAMINATION. 
When those Showcase Owners (Technically called as PARTNERS) referred by the Member of wolmal.com via HANDSHAKES  can make BUSINESS BRIDGES (BB) by purchasing  PRODUCTS, the person who did that HANDSHAKE REFERRAL is eligible for 50% of their BUSINESS BRIDGES (BB). These Bridges he/she gained from every HANDSHAKE PARTNER is termed as COLLECTION BRIDGES (CB). (To be eligible for CB, one should have minimum 1 BB in that particular month. CB will be allotted to eligible members for a maximum of continuous 5 years or 60 full calendar months)
Eg. ILLUSTRATION C: Assume that a MEMBER has been selected to attend RSO, CSO & CSO+ training modules and completed successfully to become a CERTIFIED SHOWCASE OWNER PLUS with a “C” displayed along with his/her profile name at MY SHOWCASE PROFILE page AND IF HE/SHE COMPLETED ALL THE ALLOWED 500 ACTIVE HANDSHAKES: Assume as per previous example, he/she purchased 30,000 worth products and paid 20,000 as cash (Balance as AB) and thereby received 20 BB; all his/her referred (ACTIVE HANDSHAKE) 500 members also did the same type of purchase and saved Rs.10,000 and collected 20 BB’s. Now he/she is eligible for 50% of those BB’s as COLLECTION BRIDGES (CB). So from a single member, he/she gets 10CB (50% of 20 BB) and thus a total of 5000 COLLECTION BRIDGES (CB) accrued in that month (500 Members X 10CB = 5000CB). Since the value of BB announced is Rs.10 in that month, the value of CB will also be the same (Wolmal has decided that BB,CB & DB will hold same value in every month. So no need of separate announcement needed) By the above illustration the total amount he/she gain from CB @ Rs.10 for that month is Rs. 50,000. (5000 CB x Rs.10=Rs.50,000) 

DB-DIRECT BRIDGES
 These Bridges are exclusive Bridges alloted by Wolmal directly to FRANCHISES (CENTERS) who have done extra miles for promoting the portal.  DIRECT BRIDGES  are Calculated As 10% of COLLECTION BRIDGES(CB) of all Active Handshakes  Referred By the CENTER OWNER (OSO’s NSO’s, RSO’s, CSO’s & CSO+ are not eligible for DB). Franchise People(CENTER OWNERS) will be trained separately to improve Leadership Skills so as to develop their business by taking care of their partners successfully. They must ensure that their HANDSHAKE PARTNERS get a decent income.
Eg. ILLUSTRATION D: Assume that a Member has been selected as Franchise and all his/her ACTIVE HANDSHAKES are having 100 CB in a particular month, then he/she is eligible for 10% of CB (10% 100 is 10DB) ie. 10 DB from each ACTIVE SHOWCASE OWNER. The value of this DB will also be the same as of the announced value of BB. If he/she is getting 10 DB from 1000 Members (as in the case of a WBC franchise) , then his/her total DB will be 10,000 and if the value of BB announced is just Rs. 10; his/her income from DB will be Rs.1 Lakh (if eligible as per criteria) in that particular month.

EB-EARNED BRIDGES 
The value of Bridges BB,CB,& DB will be calculated and announced on or after 25th of EVERY NEXT MONTH of ACTUAL BUSINESS MONTH in Indian Rupees and will be announced as EARNED BRIDGES (EB) of that SHOWCASE OWNER. The formula to calculate EB is EB=Value of BB+CB+DB.  (The value of One EB will be One INDIAN RUPEE) EB can be redeemed for PRODUCTS from recommended CERTIFIED SHOWROOMS by Qualified SHOWCASE OWNERs. NSO/RSO/CSO/CSO+ & FRANCHISES(CENTERS) can request wolmal to convert EARNED BRIDGES (EB) to Money (CASH in INDIAN CURRENCY through BANK ACCOUNTS-provided BANK ACCOUNT & PAN CARD DETAILS should be furnished in advance) and after deducting Taxes(TDS) as per Government Rules, the Balance will be credited to their Bank account. 
Eg. ILLUSTRATION E: If a CSO PLUS Rank Holder has 20 BB’s, 5000 CB’s (as per all the above examples) and Zero DB’s (only FRANCHISE CENTERS are eligible for DB’s), his/her EB for this month is calculated as follows. The formula to calculate EB is EB=Value of BB+CB+DB. So here value of 20BB has been calculated as Rs.200 and of 5000 CB as 50,000. Hence EB= 200 + 50,000 + 0 = 50,200. As per Rule of Wolmal, a CSO PLUS member is allowed to Earn maximum Rs.50,000 only in a month. So here he/she can request to withdraw upto 50,000 as CASH in that month to his/her Bank Account. The surplus amount of Rs. 200 will go back to WOLMAL.
Eg. ILLUSTRATION E (1) In all the above examples the value of 1 BB is given as Rs.10. If it is announced as Rs.20, the EB has to be calculated as EB=Value of BB+CB+DB. BB=Rs.400, CB= 1,000,00, DB=0. So 400+1,000,00+0=1,00400. Here as per rule, a CSO PLUS is allowed to earn maximum 50,000 only: so the EB credited to his/her account will be 50,000 and the balance will go back to Wolmal. (In these situations Members may apply for FRANCHISE CENTERS to Gain the Full Amount).  To Earn Money, All Members have to inform the bank account details requested and also should fill up PAN Card Number. More over either Passport or Aadhar /Voter ID Number also should be filled in the space provided at Personal Information at MY ACCOUNTS menu. 


FRANCHISES OF WOLMAL
To start a FRNCHISE CENTER, eligible member has to Submit the Prescribed Filled application form in advance and if selected and allotted, has to Pay the FRANCHISE LICENCE FEE (NON REFUNDABLE) at the Bank Account of WOLMAL and an AGREEMENT in STAMP PAPER (in Duplicate) also has to be submitted by the Member.
ALL FRANCHISE CENTERS ARE ELIGIBLE TO EARN 20% COMMISSIONS ON PAID ADVERTISEMENTS WHICH THEY COLLECTED AND SUBMITTED TO wolmal.com.
There are 3 Types of FRANCHISEs- 
1. MICRO FRANCHISE
2. MINI FRANCHISE
3. MASTER FRANCHISE
MICRO FRANCHISEs: 
CAN START AT HOME.   At least A TABLE SPACE IS REQUIRED.
2 TYPES of MICRO FRANCHISES.
(1)  WOLMAL AFFILIATE CENTER (WAC) 
(2)  WOLMAL BUSINESS CENTER (WBC)

WOLMAL AFFILIATE CENTER (WAC):
 Allowed to do upto 500 HANDSHAKES within the agreement period of 5 Years(60 Months) and the Maximum Income Limit in a month will be Rs. 1 lakh. The AFFILIATE CENTER is authorised to train and motivate all these 500 PARTNERS to collect their AB, BB & CB and to make sure that they earn a decent income as per their criteria. 
Here the FRANCHISE GAINS DIRECT BRIDGES WHICH WILL BE 10% OF THE CB OF Active PARTNERS.

WOLMAL BUSINESS CENTER (WBC): 
Allowed to do upto 1000 HANDSHAKES within the agreement period of 5 Years(60 Months) and the Maximum Income Limit in a month will be Rs. 2 lakh. The BUSINESS CENTER is authorised to train and motivate all these 1000 PARTNERS to collect their AB, BB & CB and to make sure that they earn a decent income as per their criteria. 
Here the FRANCHISE GAINS DIRECT BRIDGES WHICH WILL BE 10% OF THE CB OF Active PARTNERS.

Eg. ILLUSTRATION F1: INCOME OF WOLMAL BUSINESS CENTER (WBC)
When this Micro Franchise WBC did 1000 Handshakes and all 1000 partners purchase(example) Rs.3000 worth GROCERIES by paying an amount of Rs. 2000 and the balance 1000 paid as AB in this month, all 1000 people and the Franchise owner also gain 2 BB each. So the CB gained by FRANCHISE OWNER will be 1000 (50% of BB of all 1000 ie. 1BB x 1000 =1000 CB). The Franchise is eligible to gain DB also. DB will be 10% of the CB's of all 1000 partners. for example;If the CB of all partners are (example) 100, then FRANCHISE (WBC) is eligible to gain 10% ie 10 DB from each and the total DB will be 10,000 (10x1000=10,000). If the value announced for BB in that month is Rs. 20, the EB will be calculated by the following method. 
EB = VALUE of BB+CB+DB. 
So 2x Rs.20 + 1000 x Rs.20 + 10,000 x Rs. 20= 40 + 20,000 + 2,00,000 = Rs. 2,20,040/-
Since the WOLMAL BUSINESS CENTER(WBC) is eligible only for Rs. 2 lakh in a month, the balance Rs.20,040/- will go back to Wolmal and this TWO LAKH will be deposited in his/her EARNED BRIDGES Box and he/she may request Wolmal to credit the amount to the BANK ACCOUNT after deducting TDS. This may continue and every month & the same BUSINESS may happen and can earn the amount every month for UPTO 5 years (60 Months as per agreement). (To gain EARNED BRIDGES in a month, the MEMBER should have at least 1 BB in that particular month.)

4) Enter ‘Application ID’ to make your PayPal account live. If you have not generated the Application ID yet and need help to do so then Click here.
[Note: You can also refer the video %3$s to know the detailed steps on how to generate PayPal Adaptive Live App ID.]
